title: What is going on with this?
body:
Im Syndra, and I'm using my W, I pick up the spheres, but i cant throw them because my W goes on cooldown for the full duration of while I'm holding them. This isn't the first time its happened.

(also theres the age old Syndra bug (which still hasn't been fixed i might add) where her ult CD doesn't have a timer, just the number, which is incredibly misleading)

In the picture, you can clearly see me holding the spheres (meaning my W is active as we speak) you can see the duration of the 'sphere holding' period in the buffs/debuffs section, and you can see that my W has been on cooldown the whole time and still has 2 seconds left, as well as seeing the ultimate CD timer.
